Children ages 511 could be eligible for COVID vaccines in the coming weeks. Here's what parents need to know about the dosage.

articles.author: Megan Marples, CNN
articles.title: High blood pressure in young adults is linked to smaller brain sizes and dementia, a study finds - CNN
articles.description: High blood pressure in young adults is linked to smaller brain size and increased risk of dementia, a new study has found.
